context: In recent years a number of well-known tourism-related organizations have placed Greek destinations in the top of <a0_0><b5_0>their lists<b5_0/><a0_0/>. In 2009 Lonely Planet ranked <a1_0><b6_0>Thessaloniki<b6_0/><a1_0/>, <a2_0><b7_0>the country's second-largest city<b7_0/><a2_0/>, the world's fifth best "Ultimate Party Town", alongside cities such as Montreal and Dubai, while in 2011 the island of Santorini was voted as the <a3_0><b8_0>best island in the world<b8_0/><a3_0/> by Travel + Leisure. The neighbouring island of <a4_0><b9_0>Mykonos<b9_0/><a4_0/> was ranked as the 5th best island Europe. Thessaloniki was the European Youth Capital in 2014.
